While the familiar part root is ubiquitous in Egyptian, separate is much less clear:
The 'P' of 'separate' is missing or hidden:
ğ“†“ ğ“Šƒ ğ“‚‹ ğ“‚¡ | separate (from) |zerr? TschÃ¼ÃŸer / 'Abschiez'
ğ“†“ ğ“‹´ ğ“‚‹ ğ“‚¦ | separate (from), raise, clear (a road), support | interstingly separate â‹ support
ğ“ƒ› ğ“…± ğ“‚§ | separate (x from y) | ??? chien â‹ schnitt ? â‡” Teil â‡” Kalb ?

One might need to look into carve / scar to understand the forms.
